fullDescription.intro: Use this node to draw structures and/or reactions using the MarvinSketch editor. Multiple structures and/or reactions can be entered. Use the 'Configure' menu item or double click this node to bring up the editor.

ports.outPort: All drawn structures are output here.
All drawn reactions are output here.

views.view: View containing the structures you have drawn in the MarvinSketch window.
View containing the reactions you have drawn in the MarvinSketch window.
